sn47.6:1.1: “Bhutapubbam, bhikkhave, sakunagghi lapam sakunam sahasa ajjhappatta aggahesi.
sn47.6:1.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, lapo sakuno sakunagghiya hariyamano evam paridevasi:
sn47.6:1.3: ‘mayamevamha alakkhika, mayam appapunna, ye mayam agocare carimha paravisaye.
sn47.6:1.4: Sacejja mayam gocare careyyama sake pettike visaye, na myayam, sakunagghi, alam abhavissa, yadidam—yuddhaya’ti.
sn47.6:1.5: ‘Ko pana te, lapa, gocaro sako pettiko visayo’ti?
sn47.6:1.7: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sakunagghi sake bale apatthaddha sake bale asamvadamana lapam sakunam pamunci:
sn47.6:1.8: ‘gaccha kho tvam, lapa, tatrapi me gantva na mokkhasi’ti.
sn47.6:2.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, lapo sakuno nangalakatthakaranam leddutthanam gantva mahantam leddum abhiruhitva sakunagghim vadamano atthasi:
sn47.6:2.2: ‘ehi kho dani me, sakunagghi, ehi kho dani me, sakunagghi’ti.
sn47.6:2.3: Atha kho sa, bhikkhave, sakunagghi sake bale apatthaddha sake bale asamvadamana ubho pakkhe sannayha lapam sakunam sahasa ajjhappatta.
sn47.6:2.4: Yada kho, bhikkhave, annasi lapo sakuno ‘bahuagato kho myayam sakunagghi’ti, atha tasseva leddussa antaram paccupadi.
sn47.6:2.5: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sakunagghi tattheva uram paccatalesi.
sn47.6:2.6: Evanhi tam, bhikkhave, hoti yo agocare carati paravisaye.
sn47.6:3.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, ma agocare carittha paravisaye.
sn47.6:3.2: Agocare, bhikkhave, caratam paravisaye lacchati maro otaram, lacchati maro arammanam.
sn47.6:3.3: Ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno agocaro paravisayo?
sn47.6:3.6: Cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya,
sn47.6:3.10: kayavinneyya photthabba ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya—
sn47.6:4.1: Gocare, bhikkhave, caratha sake pettike visaye.
sn47.6:4.2: Gocare, bhikkhave, caratam sake pettike visaye na lacchati maro otaram, na lacchati maro arammanam.
sn47.6:4.3: Ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo?
sn47.6:4.7: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.6:4.10: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam—
sn47.6:4.11: ayam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo”ti.
